amendment.description: To provide for coverage for self-injected biologicals under part B of the medicare program until Medicare Prescription Drug plans are available.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1019 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1019 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S8415, S8416-8418; text: CR S8415) To provide for coverage for self-injected biologicals under part B of the medicare program until Medicare Prescription Drug plans are available.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1019 proposed by Senator Conrad.
